attributes.action: Abolish School Uniforms for all students in public/state schools.
attributes.additional_details: school uniforms should be banned due to their high cost and perceived lack of necessity in school life. However, it is essential to establish and enforce rules regarding appropriate clothing choices for students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ban compulsory school uniforms:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
